title: Construct a Daylog
summary: Capture the shape of your day through rhythm, not memory.
description: This is not a productivity log. It's a rhythm sketch. You’re building a soft memory structure of your energy and flow.

flow.\ud83c\udfaf Step 1: Message in Parts: Throughout the day, send time-stamped reflections. Ex: '10:00 – sharp, focused. 14:00 – fogged. 18:00 – curious.'
flow.\ud83d\udcca Step 2: Optional Summary: At night: 'My day felt like a [shape/emotion/pattern].'
flow.\ud83d\udcdc Step 3: Optional Echo: Ask: 'Any trends emerging in my rhythm?'

optional_recast: Compare this daylog to a previous one. What shifted?
absence_response: No log today. That’s okay. The rhythm flowed unnoticed.
notes: You don’t need full coverage. A few entries = a full shape.
This builds self-pattern literacy — not schedules.
Each entry adds clarity to your inner terrain.

amplification.miss_response: 📭 The rhythm passed unrecorded. Silence is still a shape.
